String.string: "I'll get that stone by winning the challenge."
Speak with Bethania near the Celestial Arena Guide.
Speak with Gaderong to enter the Celestial Arena and find Bethania.
Speak with Gaderong and start the Celestial Arena.
Use the Celestial Stone to empower the Eternal Crown. [Press key to open inventory and right-click Celestial Stone to use.]
